Parameters: int: the layout resources used to create drop down views
setDropDownViewResource(int).Description: Sets the layout resource of the drop down views.

Parameters: int: the layout resources used to create item views
setViewResource(int).Description: Sets the layout resource of the item views.

ClassDesc: Static library support version of the framework's https:##developer#android#com@B_android#widget#ResourceCursorAdapter_E@. Used to write apps that run on platforms prior to Android 3.0. When running on Android 3.0 or above, this implementation is still used; it does not try to switch to the framework's implementation. See the framework SDK documentation for a class overview.
